sentences.en: " Of all the drivel you've been spouting ,'said Jou - chia , " that's the one thing worth hearing. "
sentences.cn: 柔嘉 道: “ 说了半天废话,就是这一句话中听. ”

sentences.en: Does drivel have a stink? How should treat?
sentences.cn: 鼻涕有臭味? 要怎么治疗?

sentences.en: Drivel slants yellow, feel to there is a stink in nose, what disease is this?
sentences.cn: 鼻涕偏黄, 觉得鼻子里有臭味, 这是什么病?

sentences.en: His previous books were Pure Drivel and Cruel Shoes, both collections of his humor pieces.
sentences.cn: 他的前两本“纯属瞎话”和“残酷的鞋”都取材于其幽默电影.

sentences.en: How can you watch that drivel on TV?
sentences.cn: 你怎么能看电视上那种胡说八道的东西？

sentences.en: I have never heard such silly drivel in all my life.
sentences.cn: 我一生中从未听到过这样的蠢话.

sentences.en: Is drivel how of excretive and generation? Can be you synthesized artificially?
sentences.cn: 鼻涕是如何分泌的和产生的? 可以人工合成 吗 ?

sentences.en: It is certainly surprising that such a highly reputable magazine should drivel about the matter.
sentences.cn: 声誉很高的杂志竟然对此事胡言一派,确实令人诧异.

sentences.en: Now don't you give me that stale drivel, Leslie.
sentences.cn: 莱斯里,你别也来向我胡扯那套陈词滥调.

sentences.en: She is still writing mindless drivel.
sentences.cn: 她还在写些没头没脑的东西。

sentences.en: The question is whether one should work for a company that spouts cretinous drivel.
sentences.cn: 问题的实质是，一个人是否应该为一家滔滔不绝说废话的公司工作。

sentences.en: Why can you store in the person's nose so much drivel ah?
sentences.cn: 为什么人的鼻子里可以储存这么多的鼻涕呀?

sentences.en: Why do they want to stir North Korea upmore with their lefty drivel , these people have enough problems .
sentences.cn: 为什么要用他们左翼的胡言乱语来搅动朝鲜呢，朝鲜已经面临足够多问题了。

sentences.en: Xiangzi couldn't bear to listen to this drivel.
sentences.cn: 祥子不能再听这些闲盘儿.

sentences.en: You're going to have to rewrite this essay - at the moment, it's just drivel.
sentences.cn: 你得重写这篇文章 —— 按现在的情形看, 它根本就是言之无物.

trans.tran_cn: 流口水，胡言乱语，糊涂话
trans.tran_en: If you describe something that is written or said as drivel, you are critical of it because you think it is very silly
